summary: This mod adds comfort in poison use by allowing to benefit a smaller Concentrated Poison effect from the start of Alchemy, then a better Concentrated Poison Perk who allow 6 hits instead of 2 (except Paralyzing Poisons). Also, the Poisoner Perk is more efficient.
descriptionHtml:
I have doing this first mod for my personal use, for improve poison without abuse.

This mod adds comfort in poison use by allowing to benefit a smaller Concentrated Poison effect from the start of Alchemy, then a better Concentrated Poison Perk who allow 6 hits instead of 2 (except Paralyzing Poisons). Also, the Poisoner Perk is more efficient.


[u][b]Alchemist Perk[/b][/u] : [i]Potions and poisons you make are 20% stronger[/i] and [b]Non-Paralyzing Poisons applied to weapons last for three times as many hits.[/b]

[u][b]Poisoner Perk[/b][/u] : Poisons you mix are [b]50%[/b] more effective.

[u][b]Concentrated Poison Perk[/b][/u] : Non-Paralyzing Poisons applied to weapons last for [b]six[/b] times as many hits.
_________________

No DLCs or Mods required
Compatible with all mods who don't change the three Perks.
